directions.step:
Combine ingredients in a bowl and mix well. Roll into small bails and place on well-greased cookie sheet. Flatten slightly with a fork. Bake in preheated 350 oven for 15 minutes or until brown. Cool on wire racks and STORE IN REFRIGERATOR...also freezes well. Notes: cream of wheat can be substituted for the wheat germ. Tester's note: Definitely something to howl about!! Cookies are soft and chewy........ Posted to MM-Recipes Digest V3 #246
Date: Mon, 9 Sep 1996 11:32:59 -0400
